Are plastic straws recyclable?

- User (2023-12-08): There is a widespread belief that plastic straws may be recycled, however this is not the case. Even though the plastic that they are constructed from is theoretically recyclable, you cannot put them in curbside recycling bins since they are not allowed. Plastic straws cannot be recycled because they are too light to be processed by the machinery used to sift recyclables.
